attributes.action: Any persons convicted of criminal acts during the current london Riots have to work free for counsil do some community works.
attributes.additional_details:
Any persons convicted of criminal acts during the current London riots should work on street to clean the meass and help those shop to Rebuild they bussiness.

work for local counsil work for the years what ever the year they ment to bee in sentence in prison, they not just stay in jail they have to clean this meass and make them do community works for free. if they want they benifits paid let them do some work for free. who ever convicted any kind of damage on our street.

No tax payer should have to contribute to those who have destroyed property.
